ie.gmit.sw.language_distribution

Class LangDist

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.language_distribution.LangDist
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HashedLangDist

    public abstract class LangDist
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract definition for a language distribution, involving recording k-mer occurrences from language samples and creating a frequency distribution array.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LangDist(Lang lang)
      Create a language distribution for a specified language.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract double[] getFrequencies()
      Generate a k-mer distribution, where each k-mer is given a frequency value between 0 and 1.
      Lang getLang() 
      int getNumRecords() 
      abstract void recordKmer(char[] kmer)
      Record a k-mer to this distribution.
      void recordSample(java.lang.String line, int k)
      Split a language sample line into k-mers and record each k-mer
